title: Calories in Sourdough Bread
meta_description: Discover calories in sourdough bread per slice, including carbs, protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for your diet.
assumptions: Commercial white sourdough bread, one medium slice (~40 g), baked without added fats or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, fermentation time, slice thickness, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of sourdough bread provides ~110 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of sourdough bread?
faqs.a: About 110 kcal for a standard 40 g slice.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in sourdough?
faqs.a: Around 21 g carbs per slice, with 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is sourdough bread low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 1 g fat per slice, mostly unsaturated.

faqs.q: How does sourdough compare to regular white bread?
faqs.a: Similar calories (~110 kcal/slice), but sourdough may have lower glycemic impact due to fermentation.
Approximately 275 kcal per 100 g, scaling from slice data.
